name: Gems Deluxe
overview: An Italian game created by Marco Caricati in the style of the famous puzzle-game Columns, but introducing some variations that force the player to make a major strategic commitment, which will make things more frenetic and exciting in this test of skill, timing and chance. The game is structured in 30 stages, in which you will have to use tactics and intelligence to fix blocks of colored gems falling from above. The aim is to build horizontal, vertical and diagonal lines formed by at least three diamonds of the same color: once built, these lines are eliminated from the playing area leaving it free space they previously occupied. The "target" to be reached is different for each level and comes briefly described at each stage change: single gems, horizontal lines, vertical, diagonal, "stars" and "target pieces". Target pieces are drawn with an exclamation point ! and must be eliminated to finish the stage. There are some special colored tokens that can be used at same way of gems; forming rows with pawns and diamonds of the same color will have different effects depending on the meaning
